jd: From: Piyush Kumar, Siriinfo piyush.kumar@siriinfo.com Reply to: piyush.kumar@siriinfo.com Role: Senior Java Backend EngineerLocation : Las Vegas, NV - Day 1 OnsiteJD:We are seeking an experienced Senior Backend Engineer (Core Java, Spring Boot) who is passionate about coding. In this role, you will be working with a development team to ensure the successful delivery of the tasks.* 7+ years of experience with software design and Core Java, Java 8 features, Spring Boot & Cloud (must) * Core Java, OOPS, Collections, Data Structures, Threads, Exceptions, Streams, Java Multithreading (Very Strong), Immutability of constants. Java Memory Management* Experience with Spring and core Spring components (Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data and Spring Data REST).* Experience with data modelling in SQL.* Must have experience in Azure or AWS cloud.* Experience in Opera Cloud Migration will be added advantage.* Experience with Web Services (REST).* Design and write new APIs and data processing code in Java.* Hands-on experience in CI/CD & GitHub.* Write technical requirements and design documents.* Work closely with a cross-functional team on the development.* Embraces emerging technology opportunities and contributes to the best practices.* Leadership Skills
